google_google_billing_account_iam_member.description: Allows management of a single member for a single binding on the IAM policy for a Google Cloud Platform Billing Account.

role.description: The role that should be applied.

member.description: The user that the role should apply to. For more details on format and restrictions see https://cloud.google.com/billing/reference/rest/v1/Policy#Binding

etag.description: (Computed) The etag of the billing account's IAM policy.
